acceptance-test-run.title: 7. Create new daily report and fill all fields
acceptance-test-run.name: 7. Create new daily report and fill all fields

test-step.description: And I input my credentials username 4009906 and password 123456
And I change language to en
When I open submenu Register of menu Daily Report
Then The system should open 'Daily Report' page

When I add new Daily report with data below | companyName | content | personInCharge | department | businessType | purpose | reminder | projectFlag | openFlag | | 北開工営 | Verify create new daily report and fill all fields | 庭田次1 | atv | ソフトウェア | クレーム | OFF | OFF | OFF |

test-group.name: And In Register daily report, I click button Add
